Sentence: Since the discovery of MgB 2 as a superconducting material in 2001 , many groups around the world have attempted to improve this material's transport properties so that it is directly applicable not only in high fields-where it could be used in magnets for particle accelerators and in systems for nuclear fusion tests with fields above 10 T-but also in low fields, where modern magnetic resonance imaging systems work in the range between 0.5 and 2.0 T.
